attributes.action: introduce 4 year fixed electoral terms for both Commons and Lords.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It should not be within the purview of any prime minister, or cabinet, to pick and choose general election dates to tactically benefit themselves, their own political party, or any other group.

A fixed term of government would remove speculation which adversely affects conduct of government and financial markets.
